replies.bodyText: That would be much nicer but also a breaking change which I'd like to avoid if possible. I'll do it in dev-3x but given Android 11 is just out, I think it makes sense to release this before 3.0.0.
replies.author: martinbonnin

keep this not deprecated for now, I'm not sure how it'll show for Java
